acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should manufacture attributes implementing Collection and Map interfaces
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldManufactureAttributesImplementingCollectionAndMapInterfaces

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.PojoWithCollectionAndMap
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type class java.lang.String
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type class java.lang.Integer and value of type class java.lang.String
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type class java.lang.String
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type class java.lang.Integer and value of type class java.lang.String
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type class java.lang.String
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type class java.lang.Integer and value of type class java.lang.String
